text: Imi vanotenda! Uyo kubva kwamuri achadzokera (achabuda) kubva kuchitendero chake (Islaam), Allah vachave vanounza vanhu vavanoda uye vachivadawo; vanozvininipisa kuvatendi, vanoomesa kune avo vasingatendi, vanorwa munzira yaAllah, uye vasingatyi kunenedzerwa nevanenedzeri. Ichi ndicho chipo chaAllah icho chavanopa kune uyo wavanoda. Uye Allah vanogutsa zvisikwa zvavo, muzivi wezvose
